short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An easy to share extension lets groups set up same customized links on members' new tab. Improves team collaboration and management.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a new tab extension. You can use it to improves your team collaboration. Teams can easily set up same custom links on members' new tabs in minutes. It improves team collaboration and productivity for teams and individuals. Easy backup and share links with teams or friends. When you change computer, you can import the backup file and your old links are on your new computer instantly. All links and categories can be customized. A true time saver. Two themes are included. More themes can be added if there are demands from users.

This extension is also useful for individual users. You can customize your links and save any useful links for later use. 

Safe to use. Completely private. No data collected.
